mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT IN_NO ORDER_NO, IN_DATE ORDER_DATE, STORE_NO STORE_NO, PRODUCT_NO PRODUCT_NO, IN_EA ORDER_EA, EMP_CODE EMP_CODE FROM STORE_IN_PRODUCT ORDER BY IN_DATE ASC

SELECT DISTINCT S.IN_NO ORDER_NO, S.IN_DATE ORDER_DATE, S.STORE_NO STORE_NO, S.EMP_CODE EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME EMP_NAME FROM STORE_IN_PRODUCT S LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON S.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE ORDER BY IN_DATE ASC, ORDER_NO ASC

SELECT DISTINCT S.IN_NO ORDER_NO, S.IN_DATE ORDER_DATE, S.STORE_NO STORE_NO, S.EMP_CODE EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME EMP_NAME, S.PRODUCT_NO PRODUCT_NO, S.IN_EA ORDER_EA, P.PRODUCT_TYPE PRODUCT_TYPE, P.PRODUCT_NAME PRODUCT_NAME, ST.STORE_NAME STORE_NAME FROM STORE_IN_PRODUCT S LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON S.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON S.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN STORE ST ON S.STORE_NO = ST.STORE_NO WHERE S.IN_NO =#{ORDER_NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE_IN_PRODUCT ( IN_NO, STORE_NO, PRODUCT_NO, IN_EA, EMP_CODE) VALUES ( #{ORDER_NO}, #{STORE_NO}, #{PRODUCT_NO}, #{ORDER_EA}, #{EMP_CODE})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM STORE_IN_PRODUCT WHERE IN_NO = #{ORDER_NO}) as isChk;
